content.rendered:
LUXE offers you a team of highly trained specialists in the area of colouring and texture design. We do this by our continual training program throughout their careers at LUXE concept salon. By working together with our team we feel we are able to give you our clients the best possible services available. As fashion is constantly changing the focus of our work is to bring you the latest colour trends please refer to our personalised colour collection, which changes Bi Annually according to hair trends locally and internationally.

We understand the importance of communication and to that end we will listen carefully, answer all questions and then offer you individualised recommendations as to what you require from our Salon Menu. Our policy is to explain and quote you on the services about to be undertaken so you feel comfortable that your hair needs will be met.

The services menu section of this site explains our services, the time they take and for approximate cost, your Stylist can give further details. At Luxe we want to ensure when you leave the salon that both the look and the satisfaction last, therefore we always recommend using professional products to guarantee all our services.

We want you to look good and feel fantastic.
